titles.title: I Will Come And Bow Down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will come and bow down At your feet Lord Jesus. In your presence, is fullness of joy. There is nothing, there is no one Who compares with You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I take pleasure in worshiping You, Lord. I take pleasure in worshiping You, Lord.{/lang-eng}
